segments.text: Good morning , sir . Here is the hotel's sauna room . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This is the first time I've come here . Could you please tell me something about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure Those who have heart disease or high blood pressure are not allowed to take sauna , for their sake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for telling me about this . What should I do here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First , change your shoes to slippers . Then walk up to the changing room to get prepared for a shower .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . How about after the shower ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After the shower , step into the washroom with birch switches , dip them in the warm water and briskly whisk them over your skin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , then enter the bathroom , There is a stove tired with wood in the room , and on the top of the stove , there is a pile of stones , which keep the heat . Throw some water on the stones , and dry steam is given off .
segments.speaker: S1
